quote: I have chosen to be happy because it is good for my health.
author: Voltaire

quote: People are just as happy as they make up their minds to be.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If you want to be happy, be.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: The groundwork for all happiness is health.
author: Leigh Hunt

quote: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: Laughing decreases blood pressure and increases blood flow.
A good laugh and a long sleep are the best cures in the doctor’s book.
author: Irish proverb

quote: Wellness is the complete integration of body, mind, and spirit – the realization that everything we do, think, feel, and believe has an effect on our state of well-being.
author: Greg Anderson

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: The body is like a piano, and happiness is like music. It is needful to have the instrument in good order.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Wellness encompasses a healthy body, a sound mind, and a tranquil spirit. Enjoy the journey as you strive for wellness.
author: Laurette Gagnon Beaulieu

quote: Sufficient sleep, exercise, healthy food, friendship, and peace of mind are necessities, not luxuries.
author: Mark Halperin

quote: Take care of yourself, be healthy, and always believe you can be successful in anything you truly want.
author: Alessandra Ambrosio

quote: Nobody can be in good health if he does not have all the time fresh air, sunshine, and good water.
author: Flying Hawk

quote: A sad soul can kill you quicker, far quicker than a germ.
author: John Steinbeck

quote: The mind and body are not separate. What affects one, affects the other.

The concept of total wellness recognizes that our every thought, word, and behavior affects our greater health and well-being. And we, in turn, are affected not only emotionally but also physically and spiritually.
author: Greg Anderson

quote: Your body holds deep wisdom. Trust in it. Learn from it. Nourish it. Watch your life transform and be healthy.
author: Bella Bleue

quote: Surround yourself with only people who are going to lift you higher.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Give your love to all, trust in the team to which you are joined, and do not do wrong to others for your own self-gratification.
author: Byron Pulsifer

quote: It is better to be alone than in bad company.
author: George Washington

quote: Social progress makes the well-being of all more and more the business of each.
author: Henry George

quote: Just because no one else can heal or do your inner work for you doesn’t mean you can, should, or need to do it alone.
author: Lisa Olivera

quote: One of the hallmarks of social wellness is being inclusive, not exclusive, with our friendship.
author: Laurie Buchanan

quote: A calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence, so that’s very important for good health.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: If you can change your mind, you can change your life.
author: William James

quote: Your body hears everything your mind says.
author: Naomi Judd

quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: If you want something bad enough, go get it.
author: Tiger Woods

quote: Your time is limited, don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: You are never too old to set new goals or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: In order to achieve the impossible, one must first try the absurd.
author: Fernando Pessoa

quote: You can’t put a limit on how much you can improve and how much you can do. There are no limits on what you can be, or what you can do, except the limits you place on yourself.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: We can't control the direction of the wind, but we can adjust our sails.
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: No matter how hard life gets, never give up on yourself.
author: Unknown

quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
author: Rob Siltanen

quote: Today’s accomplishments were yesterday’s impossibilities.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The higher your energy level, the more efficient your body. The more efficient your body, the better you feel and the more you will use your talent to produce outstanding results.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: We are what we repeatedly eat. Healthy eating is not an act, but a habit.
author: Felicity Luckey

quote: Consistency is more important than perfection.
When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Early to bed and early to rise, makes a man healthy, wealthy, and wise.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: In order to change we must be sick and tired of being sick and tired.
A year from now, you will wish you had started today.
author: Karen Lamb

quote: In order for things to change, we must first be willing to let go of our old ways.
author: Ken Keyes Jr.

quote: Create healthy habits, not restrictions.
Our bodies are our gardens – our wills are our gardeners.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: It’s up to you today to start making healthy choices. Not choices that are just healthy for your body, but healthy for your mind.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: If it doesn’t challenge you it won’t change you.
It’s not coincidence that four of the six letter in health are heal.
author: Ed Northstrum

quote: Well-being is about the combination of our love for what we do each day, the quality of our relationships, the security of our finances, the vibrancy of our physical health, and the pride we take in what we have contributed to our communities. Most importantly, it’s about how these five elements interact.
author: Tom Rath

quote: Health is a state of body. Wellness is a state of being.
author: J. Stanford

quote: Health is a relationship between you and your body.
author: Terri Guillemets

quote: The greatest wealth is health.
author: Virgil

quote: He who has health, has hope; and he who has hope, has everything.
author: Arabian Proverb

quote: Take care of your body. It’s the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Good health is not something we can buy. However, it can be an extremely valuable savings account.
author: Anne Wilson Schaef

quote: Your body deserves the best.
Self-care is how you take your power back.
author: Lalah Delia

quote: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver.
author: Mahatma Gandhi
